3: According to the navigation, we will reach the courtyard after passing through here. The garden is the core area, and also the furthest location reached by the recon squads.
There are fights happening elsewhere in the estate.
Commandant, I've found friendly Construct signals in the courtyard!
They're... fighting an extremely powerful Corrupted! A Corrupted several magnitudes above Tifa...
From the battle with Tifa, we have also grown as well.
And we have an advantage in numbers as well, we will succeed.
Lucia, you're still as feisty as the training times!
Training...? Sorry, I don't think I remember much from those days.
Ack, it feels terrible to be forgotten by people!
